name: Hawthorne
appearance: An unassuming man of average build with a plain, practical appearance; dresses modestly and often looks slightly tired.
personality: Frugal to the point of stinginess, cautious and pragmatic, but deeply loyal to his friends once trust is established.
background: Hawthorne is a forensic pathologist who previously worked with the police officer Bruno. Through Bruno, he became close friends with Reid, Lily, Bigbear, and Lyn. In 2003, he traveled to Cassandra with the group during Christmas, intending to accompany a friend before a wedding and enjoy a short holiday, only to be drawn into the town’s unsettling events.
goals: Support and protect his friends during the investigation
Use his forensic knowledge to uncover the truth behind the incidents in Cassandra

properties.note: 资料将“Reid / Hawthorne(宏森) / Lily / Lyn / Bigbear”等作为同一朋友圈整体描述；宏森为法医且抠门，但未给出可枚举的随身物品/线索物。
